summary.span: 含有繼承自 之物件的泛用資料行對應。

span.span: Contains a generic column mapping for an object that inherits from .
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可讓您使用的資料行名稱不同的資料來源中。A enables you to use column names in a that are different from those in the data source. `DataAdapter`使用對應來比對資料行時的資料表中或更新資料來源。The `DataAdapter` uses the mapping to match the columns when the tables in the or data source are updated. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[DataAdapter DataTable 和 DataColumn 對應](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，並將它加入至。The following example creates a object and adds it to a . 然後它會告知使用者對應已加入至集合，並顯示對應的父系。It then tells the user that the mapping was added to the collection and shows the Parent for the mapping. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
